text: Dennis Novikov and Julio Peralta were the defending champions but only Novikov chose to defend his title, partnering Stefan Kozlov. Novikov lost in the quarterfinals to Gonzalo Escobar and Roberto Quiroz. Scott Lipsky and Leander Paes won the title after defeating Máximo González and Leonardo Mayer 4–6, 7–6(7–5), [10–7] in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Tallahassee Tennis Challenger - Doubles 2017 Doubles
title: 2017 Tallahassee Tennis Challenger – Doubles
